review.title: “Owner out for himself only!”
review.pros: Pros – Good sales people and manager
review.cons: Cons – Owner half asses and expects golden results
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Step up and take the blame

review.title: “sales agent”
review.pros: Pros – Horrible..leads and no commision. i would not recommend anyone to take this job unless its a last resort to make 22 an hour.
review.cons: Cons – get paid 22 dollars an hour
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – there is no management
